Name: oral cavity carcinoma in situ
Definition: An in situ carcinoma of the oral cavity that is located_in the epithelium. It is the most common cause of leukoplakia and associated with the development of squamous cell carcinoma.

Name: pharynx carcinoma in situ
Definition: An in situ carcinoma of the pharynx that is located_in the epithelium. It is associated with the development of squamous cell carcinoma.

Name: gall bladder carcinoma in situ
Definition: An in situ carcinoma located_in the surface epithelium of the gallbladder that most commonly develops into adenocarcinoma.

Name: bile duct carcinoma in situ
Definition: An in situ carcinoma located_in the surface epithelium of the bile duct that most commonly develops into adenocarcinoma.

Name: bronchus carcinoma in situ
Definition: An in situ carcinoma located_in the bronchus that most commonly develops into adenocarcinoma.

Name: adenocarcinoma in situ
Definition: An in situ carcinoma that derives_from epithelial cells of glandular origin.
Synonym: Combined hepatocellular carcinoma and cholangiocarcinoma (morphologic abnormality)

Name: endometrium carcinoma in situ
Definition: An in situ carcinoma that is located_in the endometrium.

Name: nasal cavity carcinoma in situ
Definition: An in situ carcinoma that is located_in the nasal cavity.
Synonym: stage 0 carcinoma of the nasal cavity

Name: prostate carcinoma in situ
Definition: An in situ carcinoma that is located_in the prostate.

Name: skin carcinoma in situ
Definition: A carcinoma in situ that is characterized by the spread of cancer in skin and the lack of invasion of surrounding tissues.

Name: breast carcinoma in situ
Definition: An in situ carcinoma that is located_in the breast.

Name: eye carcinoma in situ
Definition: A carcinoma in situ that is characterized by the spread of cancer in the eye and the lack of invasion of surrounding tissues.

Name: obsolete Hodgkin's lymphoma
Definition: A carcinoma in situ that is characterized by the spread of cancer in the eye and the lack of invasion of surrounding tissues.

Name: obsolete Hodgkin's granuloma involving spleen
Definition: A carcinoma in situ that is characterized by the spread of cancer in the eye and the lack of invasion of surrounding tissues.

Definition: A carcinoma in situ that is characterized by the spread of cancer in the eye and the lack of invasion of surrounding tissues.

Definition: An in situ carcinoma that is located_in the lung.

Name: trachea carcinoma in situ
Definition: An in situ carcinoma that is located_in the trachea.

Name: obsolete repetitive intrusions of sleep
Definition: An in situ carcinoma that is located_in the trachea.

Name: penis carcinoma in situ
Definition: An in situ carcinoma that is located_in the penis.

Name: obsolete Hodgkin's sarcoma involving lymph nodes of multiple sites
Definition: An in situ carcinoma that is located_in the penis.
Synonym: Hodgkin's sarcoma of lymph nodes of multiple sites (disorder)

Name: obsolete herpetic vulvovaginitis
Definition: A genital herpes that results_in infection located_in vulva and located_in vagina

Definition: An in situ carcinoma that is located_in the larynx.

Definition: An in situ carcinoma that is located_in the larynx.

Definition: An in situ carcinoma that is located_in the intestine.

Definition: An in situ carcinoma that is located_in the bladder.
